creator: woranop@msn.com
text: I modified Column Class by add HyperLinkStyleClass field and modified output similar this .. .I don't know what website would I tell Apache about my modifition.I think i will send this message to right website. I am wrong.Sorry Thank you Tom

Oracle9iAS 9.0.2 does not support all the features of JSP 1.2. The DataGrid Tag 
Lib requires a JSP 1.2 J2EE Server. Oracle9iAS 9.0.3 and 10g supports it. I've 
been testing the datagrid tag lib in those enviroments and it works fine.
creator: nestor.boscan@tcs.com.ve
nestor.boscan@tcs.com.ve
text: The new version supports the hyperLinkStyleClass attribute.
